name: Astesice×Live, Kairi
effect:
[CONT](VC):All of your rear-guards placed this turn get [Power] +5000.

productName: [VGE-D-LBT02] Lyrical Booster Pack 02: Lyrical Monasterio ~It’s a New School Term!~

name: Coming Beauty, Herminia
effect:
[ACT](VC):[COST][Counter-Blast]1], and this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.
Powerful－[AUTO](VC):At the end of the battle this unit attacked, if the total number of cards in your soul and face up cards in your damage zone is zero, [COST][discard a card from your hand], choose one of your rear-guards with the Powerful ability, and [Stand] it. Reduce the next [Counter-Blast] you pay this turn by ①.
productName: [VGE-D-LBT02] Lyrical Booster Pack 02: Lyrical Monasterio ~It’s a New School Term!~

name: Scintillate Rays, Ophelia
effect:
[AUTO](RC):At the end of the battle your "Prismagica, Wilista" on (VC) attacked, perform all of the following according to the cards you [Soul-Blast] for your vanguard's ability or played this turn.

・"Everlasting Sapphire"‐[COST][Counter-Blast]1 & Put a back row center rear-guard on the bottom of your deck], [Stand] this unit, and shuffle your deck.
productName: [VGE-D-LBT02] Lyrical Booster Pack 02: Lyrical Monasterio ~It’s a New School Term!~

name: MiMish, Fortia
effect:
Friend－[CONT](VC/RC):If you have another unit in the same column as this unit, that unit and this unit become "Friends".

productName: [VGE-D-LBT02] Lyrical Booster Pack 02: Lyrical Monasterio ~It’s a New School Term!~

name: Canon of Overlaid-spinning, Dietlinde

productName: [VGE-D-LBT02] Lyrical Booster Pack 02: Lyrical Monasterio ~It’s a New School Term!~

[CONT](GC):All of your units with "Earnescorrect" in their card names get [Shield] +10000.
[CONT](GC):All of your rear-guards with "Earnescorrect" in their card names cannot be hit.
productName: [VGE-D-LBT02] Lyrical Booster Pack 02: Lyrical Monasterio ~It’s a New School Term!~

name: Aim for the Horizon, Piael
effect: Black Wings－[CONT](RC):If you have a vanguard with "Alestiel" in its card name, this unit can attack a grade 3 or greater vanguard from the back row.
productName: [VGE-D-LBT02] Lyrical Booster Pack 02: Lyrical Monasterio ~It’s a New School Term!~

name: Grazioso Prince, Meredith
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit's attack hits a vanguard, look at seven cards from the top of your deck, choose up to one Order card from among them, reveal it and put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
productName: [VGE-D-LBT02] Lyrical Booster Pack 02: Lyrical Monasterio ~It’s a New School Term!~

name: Sound in the Wind, Ducayla
effect: [AUTO](RC)[1/turn]:When your unit with the Friend ability is placed in the same column as this unit, if you have three or more other "Friends", [COST][Counter-Blast 1], and draw a card.
productName: [VGE-D-LBT02] Lyrical Booster Pack 02: Lyrical Monasterio ~It’s a New School Term!~

name: Beware of Overeating! Eileen
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit boosts a rear-guard, look at the top card of your deck, and put it on the top or bottom of your deck.
productName: [VGE-D-LBT02] Lyrical Booster Pack 02: Lyrical Monasterio ~It’s a New School Term!~

name: Next Step, Laplume
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), if you have a vanguard with "Astesice" in its card name, choose a grade 2 or less card with "Astesice" in its card name from your soul, and you may call it to an open (RC) as [Rest]. If you called it during your battle phase, [Stand] that called unit.
productName: [VGE-D-LBT02] Lyrical Booster Pack 02: Lyrical Monasterio ~It’s a New School Term!~

name: Spokesperson of Heavenly Voice, Herjuel
effect: White Wings－[AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC) from hand during your main phase, [COST][Counter-Blast]1], choose a card with the White Wings ability not named "Spokesperson of Heavenly Voice, Herjuel" from your drop, and call it to an open (RC).
productName: [VGE-D-LBT02] Lyrical Booster Pack 02: Lyrical Monasterio ~It’s a New School Term!~

name: Eternally Indistinguishable Aubade, Irene
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit boosts a <Ghost> normal unit rear-guard, this unit gets [Power] +2000 until end of that battle. At the end of that battle, you may put that boosted rear-guard on the bottom of the deck.
productName: [VGE-D-LBT02] Lyrical Booster Pack 02: Lyrical Monasterio ~It’s a New School Term!~

name: Burgeoning Tone, Signe
effect:
Powerful－[AUTO](RC):When this unit boosts, if your soul has no cards, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], choose one of your other units, and it gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.
[AUTO](RC):At the end of the battle this unit boosted, if you have a vanguard with the Powerful ability, [Stand] this unit, choose a card from your soul, and put it into your drop.
productName: [VGE-D-LBT02] Lyrical Booster Pack 02: Lyrical Monasterio ~It’s a New School Term!~
